post.description:
Create a new user.

SQL Queries:
    SELECT * FROM users WHERE email = :email
    INSERT INTO users (...) VALUES (...) RETURNING *

get.description:
List all users. Manager only.

SQL: SELECT * FROM users [WHERE role = :role] ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT :limit OFFSET :offset
     SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users [WHERE role = :role]

post.description:
Admin endpoint to create users with specific roles.

SQL: INSERT INTO users (...) VALUES (...) RETURNING *

get.description: Get current user profile.

patch.description:
Update current user's profile.

SQL: UPDATE users SET ... WHERE user_id = :user_id RETURNING *

post.description:
Change current user's password.

SQL: UPDATE users SET password_hash = :password_hash WHERE user_id = :user_id

get.description:
Get current user's orders with items.

SQL: SELECT * FROM orders WHERE user_id = :user_id ORDER BY created_at DESC
     SELECT * FROM order_items WHERE order_id = :order_id

schema.title: Response Get My Orders Users Me Orders Get

get.description:
Get a user by ID.

SQL: SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = :user_id

patch.description:
Update a user's role. Admin only.

SQL: UPDATE users SET role = :role WHERE user_id = :user_id RETURNING *

post.description:
OAuth2 compatible token login, get an access token for future requests.

SQL Query:
    SELECT * FROM users WHERE email = :email

Create a new category. Requires admin role.

SQL: INSERT INTO categories (...) VALUES (...) RETURNING *

get.description:
List all categories with optional filter.

SQL: SELECT * FROM categories [WHERE is_active = :is_active]

schema.title: Response List Categories Catalog Categories Get

get.description:
Get a single category by ID.

SQL: SELECT * FROM categories WHERE category_id = :category_id

put.description:
Update a category. Requires admin role.

SQL: UPDATE categories SET ... WHERE category_id = :category_id RETURNING *

delete.description:
Delete a category. Requires admin role.

SQL: DELETE FROM categories WHERE category_id = :category_id

post.description:
Create a new product with optional variants. Requires admin role.

SQL: INSERT INTO products (...) VALUES (...) RETURNING *
     INSERT INTO product_variants (...) VALUES (...) for each variant

get.description:
List products with optional filters and sorting.

SQL: SELECT * FROM products WHERE ... ORDER BY ... LIMIT ... OFFSET ...

schema.title: Response List Products Catalog Products Get

get.description:
Get a single product by ID with variants.

SQL: SELECT * FROM products WHERE product_id = :product_id
     SELECT * FROM product_variants WHERE product_id = :product_id

put.description:
Update a product. Requires admin role.

SQL: UPDATE products SET ... WHERE product_id = :product_id RETURNING *

delete.description:
Delete a product. Requires admin role.

SQL: DELETE FROM products WHERE product_id = :product_id

post.description:
Create a new variant for a product.

SQL: INSERT INTO product_variants (...) VALUES (...) RETURNING *

get.description:
List all variants for a product.

SQL: SELECT * FROM product_variants WHERE product_id = :product_id

schema.title: Response List Variants Catalog Products  Product Id  Variants Get

get.description:
Get all reviews for a product.

SQL: SELECT r.*, u.name as user_name 
     FROM reviews r 
     JOIN users u ON r.user_id = u.user_id 
     WHERE r.product_id = :product_id [AND r.is_approved = :is_approved]
     ORDER BY r.created_at DESC LIMIT ... OFFSET ...

schema.title: Response List Product Reviews Reviews Products  Product Id  Get

get.description:
Get review summary (average rating, count) for a product.

SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) as total_reviews, AVG(rating) as average_rating 
     FROM reviews WHERE product_id = :product_id AND is_approved = true
     
     SELECT rating, COUNT(*) as count 
     FROM reviews WHERE product_id = :product_id AND is_approved = true
     GROUP BY rating

schema.title: Response Get Product Review Summary Reviews Products  Product Id  Summary Get

post.description:
Mark a review as helpful (increment helpful_count).

SQL: UPDATE reviews SET helpful_count = helpful_count + 1 WHERE review_id = :review_id RETURNING *

get.description:
Get all reviews (for admin dashboard).

SQL: SELECT r.*, u.name as user_name, p.name as product_name, p.slug as product_slug
     FROM reviews r
     JOIN users u ON r.user_id = u.user_id
     JOIN products p ON r.product_id = p.product_id
     [WHERE r.is_approved = :is_approved]
     ORDER BY r.created_at DESC LIMIT ... OFFSET ...

schema.title: Response List All Reviews Reviews  Get

patch.description:
Approve a review.

SQL: UPDATE reviews SET is_approved = true WHERE review_id = :review_id RETURNING *

Reject a review.

SQL: UPDATE reviews SET is_approved = false WHERE review_id = :review_id RETURNING *

get.description:
List all provinces.

SQL: SELECT * FROM provinces

schema.title: Response List Provinces Locations Provinces Get

post.description:
Create a new province.

SQL: INSERT INTO provinces (code, name) VALUES (...) RETURNING *

Create a new ward.

SQL: INSERT INTO wards (...) VALUES (...) RETURNING *

get.description:
List all wards for a province.

SQL: SELECT * FROM wards WHERE province_id = :province_id

schema.title: Response List Wards Locations Provinces  Province Id  Wards Get

post.description:
Create a new shipping address for a user (admin endpoint).

SQL: INSERT INTO shipping_addresses (...) VALUES (...) RETURNING *

get.description:
List all shipping addresses for a user.

SQL: SELECT * FROM shipping_addresses WHERE user_id = :user_id AND deleted_at IS NULL

schema.title: Response List User Addresses Locations Users  User Id  Shipping Addresses Get

get.description:
Get current user's shipping addresses.

SQL: SELECT * FROM shipping_addresses WHERE user_id = :user_id AND deleted_at IS NULL

schema.title: Response Get My Addresses Locations Me Shipping Addresses Get

post.description:
Create a new shipping address for current user.

SQL: INSERT INTO shipping_addresses (...) VALUES (...) RETURNING *

put.description:
Update current user's shipping address.

SQL: UPDATE shipping_addresses SET ... WHERE shipping_address_id = :address_id AND deleted_at IS NULL RETURNING *

delete.description:
Delete current user's shipping address.

SQL: UPDATE shipping_addresses SET deleted_at = NOW() WHERE shipping_address_id = :address_id

Update order status. Admin only.

SQL: UPDATE orders SET status = :status WHERE order_id = :order_id RETURNING *
